overview:
Texas Air Mechanical: A Winning Proposition for HVAC Services and Solutions

Introduction

When it comes to providing superior HVAC services and solutions to the Dallas Ft. Worth Metroplex, Texas Air Mechanical is the clear winner. Leaving others competitors far behind, since 1996, Texas Air Mechanical is dedicated to bringing its customers quality TRANE products and exceptional service through its professionally trained HVAC technicians and installers.

Skilled Services

The company’s skilled technicians are fully trained to identify and meet customer comfort concerns. So, whether it is a new unit for homes, a query about commercial service, or even financial information that customers require, Texas Air Mechanical is always at the service of its customers.

Simply the No. 1

Texas Air Mechanical is simply the No. 1 when it comes to HVAC service and solutions. Texas Air Mechanical has provided the comfort needs of thousands of homes throughout the Metroplex area. It is the company’s philosophy to provide quality air products as well as services in a prompt and a professional manner and that too at an exceptional value. The objective of the company is to exceed the fullest expectations of its customers.

Best in Class Residential Products & Services:

Design and install quality home comfort systems Service, repair and replace all makes and models Service, repair and install Geothermal Heat Pump Systems Troubleshooting and Diagnosis EPA Registered and Certified Technicians Freon Leak Detection Indoor Air Quality systems Install custom Wine Room Units Service Contract Agreements

Accessories & Options:

Ductless Mini Split Systems Humidifiers Dehumidifiers Zoning dampers Carbon Monoxide detectors Energy saving programmable thermostats Best in Class Commercial Products:

Rooftop Units Heat Pumps Split Systems Geothermal Heat Pumps Ductless Mini Split Systems Computer Room Units Unit and Radiant Heaters Portable Cooling Units Indoor Air Quality Product

Maintaining Comfort Always

The company’s goal is to help its customers maintain comfort in their homes or work places. The company strives to provide the best and quality workmanship and even goes the extra mile in designing and installing premier HVAC systems for its clients. Even if clients require replacement or a new design, an entirely new system for a new domestic or commercial construction, or even a new duct work for a remodeled space, Texas Air Mechanical vouches for its crews that stand way above the rest.

24/7 All Year Service Contact Texas Air Mechanical on Office: 972-223-1532or Fax: 972-767-0991. Alternatively visit www.texasairmechanical.com for additional information.
